Class FixedGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph
      • FixedGraph

  • public class FixedGraph
extends Graph
    This class implements a custom algorithm for the creation of random graphs with fixed connectivity.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int connectivity
      Stores the maximum number of edges
      int graphSeed
      In this variable is stored the seed number that feeds the random pseudogenerator and allows the creation of reproducible graphs.

        adjacencyMatrix, vertexNumber, vertices

      Prints Graph Topology on a text file and is stored in the classpath defined by the topologyFilePath argument.
      The integer argument numOfVertices is the number of vertices/nodes of the graph.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FixedGraph

        public FixedGraph(int numOfVertices,
          int b,
          int seed)
        Initialize Random Graph with integer arguments the number of vertices and the number of neighbours each node will have.
        The algorithm work as follows:
        1. Start with a graph with N nodes and no edges
        2. Connect each pair of two nodes with probability Per.
        3. Pick randomly a vertex v and a vertex u from the pool p, if the pool p has at least two elements, else exit
        4. Connect vertex v with vertex u and decrease their available connectivity by one
        5. If vertex's v or vertex's u available connectivity is 0, remove it from the pool
        6. Repeat step 3

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public void check(int numOfVertices)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Check adjacency among veritces and print results either on screen or on file

      • printTopology

        public void printTopology(int numOfVertices,
                 java.lang.String topologyFilePath)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Prints Graph Topology on a text file and is stored in the classpath defined by the topologyFilePath argument.
        The integer argument numOfVertices is the number of vertices/nodes of the graph.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
